title: Osama
actors: Marina Golbahari, Mohammad Arif Herati, Zubaida Sahar, Mohammad Nadir Khwaja
plot: The Taliban are ruling Afghanistan, they being a repressive regime especially for women, who, among other things, are not allowed to work. This situation is especially difficult for one ...
awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 14 wins & 11 nominations.
